ADS_STATION.content1: Welcome to Tentacle Locker overview and gameplay for school game in which you will interact with girls in short skirts
ADS_STATION.content2: Stir through the school building and wait for the girl to come close to the locker,The game begins in a locker room, however. Some girls will move right before the lockers in the class. The players should then pull them with Tentacles into the locker. They were then forced to wear rugs against their will.
ADS_STATION.content3: press the button and the girl will be caught by the tentacles
ADS_STATION.content4: See a girl you like? Get her in your locker!,It looks pretty embarrassing, but it’s a book- or horror-based game. But you have to consider it an amusing game. But you will still have the opportunity to see those audacious scenes. But it isn’t that audacious. But to watch and enjoy real fun.
ADS_STATION.content5: Use the arrow keys (or A and D) to move around, and Space to grab.
ADS_STATION.content6: Once you've caught a girl, you can take a peak at whats going on inside
ADS_STATION.content7: While watching, use the arrows to advance, or esc to force out.
ADS_STATION.content8: Tentacle Locker is a game that involves forcing schoolgirls wearing pleated skirts into the lockers at a high school against their will by using a tentacle
